item.description:
A movie featuring more video game characters in one place than anything since "Captain N"! Tired of playing the role of a bad guy, Ralph takes matters into his own massive hands and sets off on a journey across the arcade through multiple generations of video games to prove he can be a hero.

Let's meet in the lobby (second floor, near the concessions) at 6:30 PM for the 7:10 PM showing (note this screening is in 2D, not 3D). Â I'll be wearing a "Joust" arcade game shirt.

Get your own tickets at the door or here:

http://www.fandango.com/regalfenwaystadium1326rpx_aaovd/theaterpage?date=11/2/2012

Movie trailer here:

http://www.gamebits.net/2012/06/06/wreck-it-ralph-trailer/
item.name: Wreck-It Ralph
